comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: The new Manly Surf Pavilion was opened on Saturday 17/12/1938 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/17549835 "It is claimed to be the most modern structure of its kind in Australia." - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/17529354

comment.author: 64403351@N08
comment._content: It is probably dated between opening and early 1940. This late 1940s photo shows the 1940 modifications to the lower level: 1.bp.blogspot.com/_GNYAR9Hj4uc/TPx8KSG5FUI/AAAAAAAAAKY/qf... (WH&S officers would be advised not to look at the man on top of the shark tower!)
